characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the end of each of his Movement phase, Illuminor Szeras can augment one unit of NECRON Warriors or Immortals that is within 1" of him.  Roll a D3 to see what augmentation the unit gains for the rest of the battle.  A unit can only be enhanced by Mechanical Augmentation once per battle.  1) +1 Strength  2) +1 Toughness  3) Ballistic Skill improved by 1
